attributes.action: polling station at glastonbury so that people can vote on the EU referendum
attributes.background: The outcome of the UK referendum on the EU membership will effect this country for ever. When the vote is held 150,000 people will be at glastonbury festival. They should have the right to vote.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Polling stations are the responsibility of local authorities.

The Electoral Commission has already notified the organisers of Glastonbury Festival that it will not be possible to have polling station set up at the festival.

You can find out more here: http://www.glastonburyfestivals.co.uk/no-eu-referendum-polling-station-at-glastonbury-2016/
